useCase.name: Edit Metadata of Deposited Item
useCase.description: Researcher edits metadata of a deposited item in the EDRMS System.

preconditions.precondition: Researcher is logged in and has necessary permissions.

successEndConditions.condition: Metadata of the deposited item is successfully updated.

useCase.trigger: Researcher selects an item to edit.

mainSequence.step: Researcher logs in to the EDRMS System.
Researcher selects an item to edit.
Researcher edits the metadata of the selected item.
